overview: Anthology of three stories united by the theme: The defense of the territory, the fight against dispossession and the creation of the other world. In the documentary, we are witnesses of the indigenous community Mezcala, the neighborhood committee Comité Salvabosque del Nixticuil and the women’s cooperative Las Papatistas. The collective and autonomous forms of organization are seeds of life in a world of destruction.
title: Seeds Against Dispossession
